pages.text: A more complex pouch which contains less slots for herbs, but compensates by providing a number of slots in which you can store non-herb items.$(br2)$(info) All pouches can be dyed to $(l:spells/component_pouches)differentiate them from others$().$(br2)$(warning) Mechanics of pouches are more directly explained the $(l:spells/component_pouches)component pouches section on spells$().
